2025-05-27.content: You can now create build triggers that build from [repositories connected to Developer Connect](https://cloud.google.com/build/docs/triggers#devcon-triggers).

summary.title: Build Triggers Now Support Developer Connect Repositories
summary.summary: You can now create build triggers that build from repositories connected to Developer Connect. This integration allows for more streamlined CI/CD workflows by enabling builds directly from your connected repositories.
